description: Brad Star is done with another long hard day at work out in the fields, and now it's time to kick back, relax, maybe knock back a beer or two. While relaxing out in the sun, he sips his beer and unwinds. The sun feels so good, the beer tastes so good, and the day has been so stressful, that before he knows it, Brad's hand has found its way to his erect cock. So he decides to strip right there and have himself a one man tractor pull.Enjoy!
title: Brad Star
